name: Help Yourself (Safwan)
description:
You Can Leave A Copy Of Yourself  Stuck In A Certain Moment Of Time, Use It As A Platform To Solve Puzzles!

Don't Worry, The Game Is VERY Simple And Short! 

Controls

WASD/Arrows: Move

Space: Jump

R: Rewind

Enter: Restart

This Game Was Made By One Guy For The Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2,  It Was Made  In Less Than 36  (Development) Hours

Music: "City Love Nostalgia!" by HeatleyBros

UI Buttons: Flat Controls UI Kit

Known Bugs

1- The Cursor Isn't Visible for Some Reason... But This Shouldn't be a much of a problem
